description:
We are passionate about offering our community the best-of-the-best service industry content. Follow us for regular updates on the very best service management news, tips, insights and more.
So ... who is Fieldpoint?
Fieldpoint helps IT service providers, management consultants, and software developers manage all aspects of service execution with 100% Web-based project management and field services software. Built on Microsoft Dynamics ERP and CRM.

Our all-in-one project management and field service software includes:
Project Management – Manage your project engagement and installation jobs in one complete system.
Field Service Management - Provide time and materials pricing, flat rate, first period, and mileage pricing for labor and travel.
Contract Support and Management - Price your product and maintenance services right down to specific devices.
Resource Assignment and Scheduling – Quickly search for the right resource skills and certificates using centralized calendar availability.
Time and Expense Reporting - Easily report hours, expenses, and progress with Web-based project time tracking.
Visit us at www.fieldpoint.net to see the complete software package.
